Hello LET members :)

Are you looking to get paid for writing How To guides and Tutorials? 

Onra Host is looking to create a extensive, in-depth, and professional community filled  knowledge base. To do this we are looking for independent content writers like yourself to write these articles. 

—

**So what exactly are we looking for? **

The content we are looking for would range from installing Debian, to setting up VSFTPD on CentOS 6, creating SSH keys, configuring exim, etc. etc. 

The articles will need to be written in terms so even a first time server admin can follow it without any problems. This means all information needs to be detailed, with a breakdown of each step. A specific length is not required. However, around 2600 words would be average. All tutorials also need to be a exclusive 1-of-1 to our website. The subject is up to you, however we can provide recommendations. 

*Examples can be given upon request for more information* 

—

Whats in it for you?

$20 per article
or
$35 per article (credited to your Onra Host account)

possible backlink

—

To request more information or send sample articles, please contact us any of the following ways:

support @ Onrahost . Com
